media_data.title: Tales from Earthsea
media_data.short_description: Based on the Earthsea novel series by Ursula K. Le Guin, the story is set in a mythic world filled with magic and bewitchment. In the land of Earthsea, a mysterious force is unsettled the balance and the only hope is a young wizard, Sparrowhawk and a prince, Arren.
